```{r setup}
library(chariot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

This package creates a properly formatted output from the OMOP 
Vocabularies for consumption by the DiagrammeR package.  

```{r,results='hide'}
# Fetch from Postgres  
nodes_and_edges <-
  ne_fetch_concept_classes(conn_fun = "pg13::local_connect()")

# Customize Nodes Attributes  
nodes_and_edges <-
  map_node_attributes(nodes_and_edges)

# Customize Edge Attributes
nodes_and_edges <-
  map_edge_attributes(nodes_and_edges)

# Construct Final Graph
final_graph <-
  construct_graph(nodes_and_edges)
final_graph$graph
```


```{r}
library(DiagrammeR)
```

```{r}
final_graph$graph %>%
  select_nodes(type == "Component") %>%
  transform_to_subgraph_ws() %>%
  render_graph()
```

```{r}
component_graph <- 
final_graph$graph %>%
  select_nodes(type == "Component") %>%
  trav_out() %>%
  transform_to_subgraph_ws() 

render_graph(component_graph)
```

```{r}
component_graph_legend <- create_legend(component_graph)
huxtable::print_html(component_graph_legend[[1]])
huxtable::print_html(component_graph_legend[[2]])
```


```{r}
final_graph$graph %>%
  select_nodes(type == "Component") %>%
  trav_in() %>%
  transform_to_subgraph_ws() %>%
  render_graph()
```
